caption.p: Bacterial viability of 24 h-old-biofilms formed by MDR strains of A. baumannii (A), P. aeruginosa (B), and MRSA (C) after 1 h treatment with oregano oil at indicated concentrations. The viability of bacterial biofilms was determined using an Alamar Blue assay. Data represent means ± SDs. ∗∗∗ p < 0.001 and ∗∗∗∗ p < 0.0001 in the presence vs. absence of oregano oil. ns, no significance.
